```{r 01030401setup, include=FALSE}
## 01030401 Find the boxplot that beter describes the data in a given histogram.
```


```{r echo=FALSE, results='hide'}
## DATA GENERATION
language = "es"
sample1=c(0,20,runif(50, 0,20),runif(50,1,5))
sample2=c(0,20,runif(30, 0,20), runif(35, 0,4),runif(35,16,20))
sample3=c(0,20,runif(50, 0,20),runif(50,7,13))

sampleList = list(sample1, sample2, sample3) 

## QUESTION/ANSWER GENERATION

sol = sample(1:3, 1)
solData = sampleList[[sol]]

k = 3 # Number of boxplots

solutions = rep(F, k)
solutions[sol] = T

if(language=='en'){
  boxplotLabels = paste0("Sample ", 1:3)
  histYlabel = "Frequency"
  question = paste0("The histrogram describes the same data as one of the following boxplots. Choose the right boxplot.")
  } else if(language=='es'){
    boxplotLabels = paste0("Muestra ", 1:3)
    histYlabel = "Frecuencia"
    question=paste0("El histograma describe los mismos datos que uno de los diagramas de caja y bigotes (boxplot). Elige el boxplot correcto.")
  }


(binarySolution = paste0(as.numeric(solutions), collapse = ""))



```


Question
========

```{r results='asis', echo=FALSE}
cat(paste(question, collapse=""))
```


```{r boxplot, echo = FALSE, results = "hide", fig.height = 6, fig.width = 6, fig.path = "", fig.cap = ""}
par(mfrow=c(2,2))
hist(solData, main = "", xlab = "", ylab = histYlabel, xlim=c(min(solData), max(solData)))
boxplot(sample1, xlab = "", main=boxplotLabels[1],  horizontal = TRUE) 
boxplot(sample2, xlab = "", main=boxplotLabels[2],  horizontal = TRUE)
boxplot(sample3, xlab = "", main=boxplotLabels[3],  horizontal = TRUE)
par(mfrow=c(1,1))
```


Answerlist
----------

```{r results='asis', echo=FALSE}
cat(paste("* ", boxplotLabels[1], collapse=""), fill = 1)
cat(paste("* ", boxplotLabels[2], collapse=""), fill = 1)
cat(paste("* ", boxplotLabels[3], collapse=""), fill = 1)
```
